description: This file contains utility functions for testing FbCommon curl-based JSON-RPC interactions, including request construction, error handling, and controller activation/deactivation commands.

methods.name: die
methods.description: Prints an error message to standard error and exits the script with status 1.

methods.name: require_curl
methods.description: Checks if the curl binary is available in the environment, otherwise terminates the script.

methods.name: jsonrpc_post
methods.description: Constructs and sends a JSON-RPC request with specified method, parameters, and identifier.

methods.name: controller_activate
methods.description: Sends a JSON-RPC request to activate the controller with a specified callsign.

methods.name: controller_deactivate
methods.description: Sends a JSON-RPC request to deactivate the controller with a specified callsign.
